name: proxy-from-env
description: offers getproxyforurl to get the proxy url for a url, respecting the *_proxy (e.g. http_proxy) and no_proxy environment variables.
kwds: offers getproxyforurl to get the proxy url for a url, respecting the *_proxy (e.g. http_proxy) and no_proxy environment variables. proxy http_proxy https_proxy no_proxy environment
